Body: Description: Clicking on Transparent client type automatically disables Sound drivers, bluetooth drivers and webcam drivers. Image attached for reference.

What We've Learned Updated: 02.05
- Transparent client type automatically disables Sound drivers, bluetooth drivers and webcam drivers
- asked for further details

Next Steps Updated: 02.05
- waiting on the customer

What We've Learned Updated: 02.05
- Transparent client type automatically disables Sound drivers, bluetooth drivers and webcam drivers
- asked for further details

05.05.
- the issue disappears after reverting to Normal mode
- sent them a new client and asked them to test

@Botond Biro​ I checked the logs and I can see the switch between normal to transparent, and the fact that the rights for Bluetooth (17) are switched to block. Based on the user manual, Bluetooth should be allowed. In my test environment, I could not see "device type: 17" change rights to 0, so I cannot confirm this behaviour on my end.
